attributes.additional_details:
I would consider that the our Goverment should  consider banning the Argentine Country from the Olympic games for the following reasons.

Using this event to promote there continous and fragrant ignorance of human rights

The 30th Aniversary of the murder of 254 British Service men

The 30th aniversary of War Crimes against the Falkland Islanders

Our Government should let it be known that any advertisement on team colours is a direct Insult and  entry toour Soveriegn Nation be barred

rejection.details: This is a matter for the IOC.
